edu.wiu.sso.cas
Class ServiceTicket

java.lang.Object
  edu.wiu.sso.cas.ServiceTicket

public class ServiceTicket
extends Object

This object represents a CAS Ticket. And at this time it only supports CAS Authentication messages in 1.0 and 2.0 formats.

At this time, this module can only parse CAS ticket validation responses to obtain the following informations:

  1. The successfulness or unsuccessfulness of validating the CAS ticket.
  2. If successful, the NetId (a.k.a the username) authenticated to the CAS Server, which is associated with the CAS ticket.
  3. If unsuccessful, the error code associated with the reason why the CAS ticket was not successfully validated
  4. If unsuccessful, the error message associated with the reason why the CAS ticket was not successfully validated

Author:
Copyright (c) 2010-2011 by Western Illinois University, CAIT. All Rights Reserved.
See Also:

ServiceTicket

public ServiceTicket(String ticketId,
                     URL serviceUrl,
                     int valVer)
Parameters:
ticketId - The Id string of this service ticket
serviceUrl - The Application Service URL
valVer - The CAS server protocol version used for validation
Method Detail

getId

public String getId()
Get the Id of the CAS Service Ticket

Returns:
The Id string of this service ticket

getServiceUrl

public URL getServiceUrl()
Get the Application Service URL

Returns:
The service URL of this service ticket

getValidationVersion

public int getValidationVersion()
Get the CAS server protocol version for validating this ticket. There are only two possible values:
  • 1 - CAS protocol version 1.0
  • 2 - CAS protocol version 2.0

Returns:
The CAS validation version of this service ticket

setValidationResponse

public void setValidationResponse(String valResponse)
                           throws IOException,
                                  ParseException
Set the validation response received from the CAS server after attempting to validate this Service Ticket. Once the validation response is set with this method, it is immediately parsed. The results from parsing the message are set into this object.

The validation response is set by AuthService.validateTicket.

Parameters:
valResponse - The response from the CAS Server after the validation attempt
Throws:
IOException - If the CAS server validation response is not in a recognized format
ParseException

getValidationResponse

public String getValidationResponse()
Get the validation response received from the CAS server after attempting to validate this Service Ticket.

The validation response is set by AuthService.validateTicket.

Returns:
The response from the CAS Server after the validation attempt

isAuthSuccess

public boolean isAuthSuccess()
After the validation response is set by AuthService.validateTicket, call this method to test is authentication is successful.

Returns:
true if the validation response indicates successful authentication

getAuthCode

public String getAuthCode()

Only for CAS Server protocol 2.0

After validation of this service ticket via AuthService.validateTicket, the Auth Code will be set if validation was unsuccessful. Use this method to retrieve the Auth Code.

Returns:
The code from the validation response, only available if validation was unsuccesful

getAuthMessage

public String getAuthMessage()

Only for CAS Server protocol 2.0

After validation of this service ticket via AuthService.validateTicket, the Auth Message will be set if validation was unsuccessful. Use this method to retrieve the Auth Message.

Returns:
The message from the validation response, only available if validation was unsuccesful

getAuthUser

public String getAuthUser()
After validation of this service ticket via AuthService.validateTicket, the Auth User will be set if validation was successful. Use this method to retrieve the Auth User.

Returns:
The user (or netid) from the validation response, only available if validation was successful

setRequestTime

public void setRequestTime(Date reqTime)
Set the time the validation was requested. This is set by AuthService.validateTicket

Parameters:
reqTime - The time at which the validation request was made

getRequestTime

public Date getRequestTime()
Before validation of this service ticket via AuthService.validateTicket, the request time is set. Use this method to get the time the validation was requested.

Returns:
The time at which the validation request was made

setResponseTime

public void setResponseTime(Date resTime)
Set the time the validation response was received. This is set by AuthService.validateTicket

Parameters:
resTime - The time at which the validation response was received

getResponseTime

public Date getResponseTime()
After validation of this service ticket via AuthService.validateTicket, the response time is set. Use this method to get the time the validation response was received.

Returns:
The time at which the validation response was received
